description.en: Level01 is the world’s leading DeFi platform with AI-guided derivatives trading across forex, commodities, and cryptocurrency markets. It is designed to make it easier for investors to connect and trade directly with each other safely and without default consequences, through settlements on the blockchain. The platform’s proprietary FairSense AI is augmented by real-time market data from Bloomberg and assists investors to assess true market value of derivatives and options contracts for consistently higher returns.
